title: The Dawning of Power
description: Power is back and no one is prepared...The Dawning of Power   Call of the Herald,  Inherited Danger,   Dragon OreEchoes of the ancients' power are distant memories, tattered and faded by the passage of eons, but that is about to change. A new dawn has arrived. Latent abilities, harbored in mankind's deepest fibers, wait to be unleashed. Ancient evils awaken, and old fears ignite the fires of war. In times such as these, ordinary people have the power to save the world . . . or destroy it.The World of Godsland fantasy series The Dawning of Power trilogyCall of the HeraldInherited DangerDragon OreThe Balance of Power trilogyRegentFeralRegal
author: Brian Rathbone
